notes:
v1.2.1
#### BUG FIXES
- fix issue for certain vm users, where meter did not update even when receiving data
v1.2.0
#### NEW FEATURES
- added skill opener rotation view (you can learn from other players' opener combo)
- added charts for boss hp %
- added death icons to chart hover
- added self-buff summaries
- buffs like conviction/judgement are now shown in self syn when a player is selected
- added pause/reset button to top bar when meter window is large enough
- added option to turn off transparency for live meter
- added option to show player gear score
full patch notes on github
 please report bugs to Snow#7777
